#summary public function rawDirectoryDump($folder='/',$version=-1)
#labels Function-Reference

= rawDirectoryDump =

This method returns a dump of all the data recieved from SVN for `$folder` from the version `$version` of the repository.
 * @param string  $folder Folder to get data
 * @param integer $version Repository version, -1 means actual
 * @return array SVN data dump.

*Note:* The first result returned in the array is intentionally the directory you are accessing.

== Usage ==
{{{
rawDirectoryDump($folder, $version);
}}}

== Examples ==
Here follows some code examples using the `rawDirectoryDump` function.

=== Latest from directory ===
Get Files from `/trunk/` directory from the latest repository version.

{{{
$url = 'http://phpsvnclient.googlecode.com/svn/';

require_once("phpsvnclient.php");
$phpsvnclient = new phpsvnclient($url);

$raw_dump = $phpsvnclient->rawDirectoryDump('/trunk/');

echo "<pre>\n";
print_r($raw_dump);
echo "</pre>\n";
}}}
